FROM google/cloud-sdk:slim

RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y golang && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY retry/retry.go .
RUN go build -o /usr/local/bin/retry retry.go

COPY wrappers/* /usr/local/bin/

ENV PATH="/usr/local/bin:${PATH}"
